title: PHP开发工程师
companyName: 上海快猫文化传媒有限公司
location: 工作地点：上海-浦东新区
jobInfo:
工作职责：
1、负责公司核心项目程序的架构设计与开发；
2、负责维护改进历史项目, 包括重构和代码错误修复；
3、负责项目的设计与编写，并参与核心程序模块的编写；
4、参与项目重难点问题的研究与优化方案设计；
5、撰写项目设计文档，定期维护与更新项目文档；
6、上级领导交代的其他事项
任职要求：
1、全日制本科及以上学历，计算机类相关专业；
2、2年以上PHP网站开发经验；
3、熟练掌握MySQL数据库开发和应用，具备数据库性能优化经验；
4、熟悉Linux操作系统，对Shell脚本有一定了解；
5、精通 LA(N)MP 相关开发技术;
6、具备较强的沟通协调能力 具备较强的需求分析能力和团队精神；
7、有高并发项目处理经验者优先考虑
我们的福利：
1、自带食堂，免费提供早餐+午餐费用
2、定期提供健康体检+免费入职体检
3、年假+春节带薪路程假
4、五险一金+补充商业医疗保险
5、每月提供交通费用+通讯费用
address: 上海市浦东新区金科路788号绿地智创商务中心13层

jobInfo:

任职要求：1.  学历：大学专科及以上，年龄（25-30）、工作经验：3年及3年以上
2. 工作城市：北京（常驻）
3.熟悉PHP开发语言技巧，熟悉常用的开发模式，要求非常熟悉thinkphp框架（3.1、3.2），能够熟练使用YII、CI框架进行项目开发不
4. Web类相关的要求：熟悉HTML、CSS，对JS（JQuery、Bootstrap等插件）要求在项目中能够熟练使用。
5.  数据库相关要求：精通MYSQL，能够熟练使用Oracle，DB2，熟练使用Radis等常用缓存
6.业务需求：熟悉支付，有过支付接口开发优先；熟悉SOCKET编程。

companyName: 上海乐搜信息科技有限公司

1、公司项目产品的建设、开发、维护及完善；
2、负责项目产品各个功能的完善与维护，新功能代码编写及测试；
3、按要求保质完成代码编写及优化。
 岗位要求：
 1.精通PHP+MySQL开发技术，精通php的面向对象编程，熟悉主流的PHP开发框架；
2.熟悉 XHTML、Javascript、JQuery、AJAX 等技术；
3.具备良好的代码写作习惯，具有规范化，要求结构清晰，逻辑性强，代码冗余率低
4.有参与过大中型网站开发经验者，对互联网产品有着良好的认知，有创意，有思想；
5 1年以上php开发经验优先；
公司目前A轮融资成功，福利待遇优厚，奖金分红多，公司位于地铁9号线沿线漕河泾开发区站、合川路站，交通便利！公司有完善的薪资考核体系、培训体系、晋升体系！一个季度一晋升，欢迎优秀的你加入我们！！
 
工作地址：北京
address: 漕河泾科技园宜山路900号科技产业化大楼C座9楼

title: PHP Developer
companyName: 上海骏普软件科技有限公司
jobInfo:
Position Identification


And Position Title 
            PHP Developer
Reports To    
                  Team Leader
Business Unit 
                  WEB
Location 
                        Shanghai, China
Position Summary
The primary focus of the role will be on PHP project development, provide professional IT services and support to our customers. While this will be done with the help of team leader, a high degree of execution will be required to understand customer’s requirements specification, coding, and maintain current system, to ensure a satisfactory and efficient system can be provide to the customer.
The incumbent will work closely with the Team Leader, Project Manager and Business Unit Manager to ensure the project to reach our customer’s requirement.
Performance Review Period
At the end of the probation period and then as a minimum at the conclusion of each financial year
Internal Relationships
▪ Business Unit Manager (s)
▪ Project Manager (s)
▪ Other Developer (s)
▪ All System in Motion Staff
 

Position Requirements


Listed, but not limited to, are the key competencies and experience for this position.
Experience and Education
▪ College or above degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant majors
▪ At least 2 years of PHP related project development experience
▪ Proficient in PHP, CSS, HTML and JavaScript (basic and JQuery)
▪ Solid knowledge of MySQL (and more generally SQL)
▪ Any knowledge of Laravel or MVC based PHP Framework, VueJS or modern JS Framework, and systems such as Concrete5, Drupal, Magento, SugarCRM is preferred
▪ Base knowledge in Linux/SSH usage and Apache/Nginx Web server setup
▪ Knowledge of other programing languages is a plus (NodeS, Ruby, Java, .Net…)
▪ Good command of spoken and written English
▪ Professional personal presentation and punctuality
▪ Goodteam player, with ability to work closely with all the team member(s)
 

Key Responsibilities


Listed, but not limited to, are the key responsibilities for this position.
1. Developing
▪ Good understanding of client’s requests
▪ Responsible for the development of common function modules under supervision of the Technical leader
▪ Conduct Test and report to the team leader
▪ Ensure good quality of code
▪ Respect projects planning and milestone plan
2. Maintenance
▪ System performance review and optimisation
▪ Daily bugs fixing
▪ System enhancement based on client’s needs
3. Reporting
▪ Reporting to the Team leader weekly
▪ Participate to Daily project status with Project Managers
4. Miscellaneous
▪ Other tasks as directed by Management
 

Send us your resume
Please send us your resume and a cover letter in English
Email:sh.hr@system-in-motion.com
Website: www.system-in-motion.com
address: 上海市静安区万航渡路888号18楼JKL座
